40 enum class BufferAttributeType {
41  kNone = -1,
42  kPosition,
43  kColor,
44  kTextureCoordinates,
45  kNormal,
46  kTangent,
47  kMiscInt,
48  kMiscReal,
49  kMAX_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE
50 };
51 
54 struct VertexAttributeInfo {
55  enum NumericalType : uint32_t {
56  kInt,
57  kFloat,
58  kDouble
59  };
60 
61  bool operator==(const VertexAttributeInfo& other) const {
62  return (other.m_attributeLength == m_attributeLength) &&
63  (other.m_numericalType == m_numericalType) &&
64  (other.m_count == m_count);
65  }
66 
67  bool operator!=(const VertexAttributeInfo& other) const {
68  return !(*this == other);
69  }
70 
71  uint32_t m_attributeLength; // e.g., vec3 vs vec4
72  NumericalType m_numericalType; // e.g., vec3i vs vec3
73  uint32_t m_count; // Number of attributes used, e.g., 3 for vec3 if vertices, normals, tangents used
74 };
75 
79 struct VertexAttributesLayout {
80  std::vector<VertexAttributeInfo> m_layout = {
81  {2, VertexAttributeInfo::kFloat, 1},
82  {3, VertexAttributeInfo::kFloat, 3},
83  {4, VertexAttributeInfo::kFloat, 2},
84  {4, VertexAttributeInfo::kInt, 1}
85  };
86 };
87 
91 struct VertexAttributes {
92  std::vector<Vector2> m_texCoords; // 'vt'(uv)
93 
95  std::vector<Vector3> m_vertices; // 'v'(xyz)
96  std::vector<Vector3> m_normals; // 'vn'
97  std::vector<Vector3> m_tangents; // tangents for normal mapping
98 
99  std::vector<Vector4> m_colors; // extension: vertex colors
100  std::vector<Vector4> m_miscReal; // (Skeletal animation) used for bone weights for skeletal animation
101 
102  std::vector<Vector4i> m_miscInt; // (Skeletal animation) used for IDs of the bones corresponding to the bone weights
103 
104  quint64 getSizeInBytes() const;
105 
106  bool empty() const;
107 
108  void clear();
109 };
